title: 6.16 Patch problem i have.
body: So, Today i tried to upgrade my league of legends with patch 6.16 and new champion Kled, and some new updates and nerfs to Sona(Thanks god). And i tried to update and i got error saying for me to fix some files or smth(i will add screenshot). So i want your help or advice how to fix this. Thanks for you help! :)

replies.body:
Issues while patching at 33% or later are generally caused by your client not being able to establish a stable connection to the patching servers. This can be influenced by poor ISP routing or local network settings that conflict with League. As a first step, I recommend working through the steps inside of our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). 

Let me know how those steps worked out for you.
